message: ...It turns out that Koujaku is meeting up with one of the women from yesterday.
She sidles up beside Koujaku and they link arms. She must've been waiting for him.
There were two of them last time, but now she's alone. I recognize her as the one with the tattoo on her neck.
Walking arm-in-arm, they look like a couple.
The stroll together down the main boulevard for a while, then veer off onto a side street. I follow quickly, determined not to lose them.
At the end of the street, I see them enter a squat little building. After I'm sure they're inside, I walk up and examine the place.
There's no sign or anything else to describe it, only a giant man in a suit standing in front of the door.
It's probably the sort of place that doesn't publicly advertise its services.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku..."
I was right all along... Koujaku blew me off to meet that woman.
My anxiety quickly turns to disappointment.
You really wanted to see her that badly?
You coulda just told me.
You're the one who always says I can talk to you about anything...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good to know how little he cares..."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."
I feel more drained than angry.
What is this place, anyway?
I approach the building. The man in the suit holds out his arm to block me.

name: 用心棒
message: "Member's card?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't have one."

name: 用心棒
message: "This area is members-only."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But my friend's in there right now."

name: 用心棒
message: "I have to ask you to leave."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I―"

name: 用心棒
message: "Please leave."
...This isn't going to work.
I'll have to give up for now.
What was that?!
Something touched my hair!
I turn around. Immediately, someone grabs my shoulder.
Who does this guy think he is?

name: 竜峰
message: "Sorry to keep you waiting. I got a little tied up at work. You thought I was inside? You should've called."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: 竜峰
message: "He's with me."

name: 用心棒
message: "Very well. Please enjoy yourselves."
The bouncer lowers his arm and bows.
What the hell just happened?
Still not sure at all what's going on, I head inside with the strange man's arm around my shoulders.
